description:
During the reign of the Second Hokage, the young Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade are assigned to Hiruzen Sarutobi’s platoon as Genins. Fascinated by Sarutobi’s summoning jutsu, Jiraiya immerses himself in mastering the transportation technique. While training, Jiraiya accidentally transports himself to Mount Myoboku, opening the path to fulfill his destiny.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tale of a Gutsy Ninja - The Jiraiya Ninja Chronicles
ド根性忍伝 ~自来也忍法帖~前編
